name: Arbolus
slogan: Arbolus is a trusted platform which helps connects people to share their experience
description:
We believe in the power of sharing experience. We do this by removing the barriers that prevent the  sharing of experience and allowing people  to realise the value of their knowledge.

Arbolus is a trusted platform which helps connect,  and foster relationships between people with experience and people that need it.

Arbolus is a global organisation with teams in London, New York and London.

team.title: Founder
team.name: Sam Glasswell
team.bioHtml: Co Founder of Collective iQ - the world's first expert knowledge platform.

team.title: Founder
team.name: Will Leeming
team.bioHtml: Founded Collective iQ in 2018, the business behind Arbolus. Focus on product and operations. Before starting the business spent 8 years working in London & NYC.

team.title: VP Revenue
team.name: James Beasant
team.bioHtml:
VP Revenue at Arbolus - Collective iQ Group
Scaling the business in order to achieve growth targets.

jobs.title: Data Engineer - Barcelona or UK
jobs.description:
### Company
At Arbolus, we believe in the power of sharing experience. 
We believe it should be easier for people with experience and knowledge to share it, and easier for businesses to use it.
We are a venture-backed scale-up data business with offices in London, Barcelona and New York. We maintain a community of 10,000+ experts and work for businesses including Fortune 500 companies, global consulting companies and leading investment firms.

### Benefits
* Flexible working
* Competitive compensation
* 2x annual retreats to awesome places
* Mentorship from external ML advisors (PHDs, Industry Leaders)

### Role
We are looking for a Data Engineer to join in a leadership role within our Hyperion team. The Hyperion team is responsible for the matching engine at Arbolus. The team uses relationship data reinforced with crowdsourcing to find the right people to solve a client problem.

It is Arbolus’ mission to deliver 1 million matches by 2022. To do this we need a highly scalable matching engine to support the rest of the business. 

We are looking for an entrepreneurially minded data engineer, ideally with experience with machine learning tools and project management. We’re a fast moving team, so a hacking mentality is encouraged. 

### What We’re Looking For
A successful candidate should have:
* 5+ years of experience in fast growth business environment
* A proven entrepreneurial interest
* Data infrastructure & analytics pipeline management experience
* Machine learning experience
* A hacking mentality
* Project management experience**

### Character traits we value
We like to work with people who are:
* Curious
* High energy
* Take initiative
* Driven

jobs.title: Frontend Developer (Hacker) - React
jobs.description:
### Company
At Arbolus, we believe in the power of sharing experience. 
We believe it should be easier for people with experience and knowledge to share it, and easier for businesses to use it.
We are a venture-backed scale-up data business with offices in London, Barcelona and New York. We maintain a community of 10,000+ experts and work for businesses including Fortune 500 companies, global consulting companies and leading investment firms.

### Benefits
* Flexible working
* Competitive compensation
* 2x annual retreats to awesome places
* Working on innovative projects

### Role
We are looking for a front end React developer who can help us across our core platform UI and on our innovation projects led in Barcelona. The role will include making iterative improvements to the user interface primarily coded by our remote developers, as well as working with our Barcelona machine learning team to develop prototype interfaces.

It is Arbolus’ mission to deliver 1 million matches by 2022. To do this we need to iterate quickly through different interfaces to make it ever simpler and better to share experience and knowledge through our platforms.

We are looking for an entrepreneurially minded, scrappy but talented front-end developer who can work with the team to produce output quickly but which is still of high quality. 

### What We’re Looking For 
A successful candidate should have:
* 2+ years of front-end experience
* An interest in design and UI
* Basic understanding of back-end infrastructure
* React and ideally React Native experience
* A hacking mentality
* Some project management experience

### Character traits we value 
We like to work with people who are:
* Curious
* High energy
* Take initiative
* Driven
